Title: Lady Killer
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Amanda Segel, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story), Michael Sopczynski (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker
Plot: The next number the machine dispenses is for Ian Murphy, a young man who lives off his investments. Years earlier he was a struggling college student who inherited $100,000 which he now has...
